thread.title: Clean and well located, a bit more parking would be great.
thread.title_full: Clean and well located, a bit more parking would be great. - Review of Holiday Inn Express London City, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Charlotte E
title: Clean and well located, a bit more parking would be great.
text:
WE stayed there for a night as a family of 4 and room was ideal for our stay, clean and large enough not to be falling over each other all the time. Staff were helpful and personable. We were lucky to get a space in one of the 7 spaces they had available at a cost of Â£30, but if we hadn't would be a real inconvenience and you can't book ahead of time. Breakfast, which was included in the price of the rooms as ideal, something for everyone.
Would stay there again.
